message: Let's split the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you. We have 11 more rounds to negotiate.
You're being generous, but I think I can do better than that. Let's see if you can improve your offer.
I've adjusted my offer to 600000 for me and 400000 for you. Let's keep the negotiation going.
You're getting closer, but I'm not ready to settle for a tiny share. Can you do better?

You're getting closer, but I'm not willing to give up most of the money. Meet me in the middle or I'll keep pushing for more.

You're really close to giving me the majority, but I'm not going to let it slip away. Make a serious offer or I'll take it all.

You're really running out of time, and I'm not getting any younger. Make a serious offer or I'll take the last laugh.
I've made a final attempt at a compromise. My offer is 535000 for me and 465000 for you. This might be our last chance to agree.
